mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into styleofcook (name,categorycode) values
(#{item.name},#{item.categorycode})
mapper.select: select categorycode from styleofcook where categorycode !='g34032' and categorycode != 'g2714' and categorycode != 'g34014' and categorycode != 'g1338' and categorycode != 'g1845'
